trans-unit.source: When the installation is finished, the Configurator window is displayed in Wizard mode the first time only. You can also access the Configurator in the , but only part of the parameters can be modified.

seg-source.mrk: When the installation is finished, the Configurator window is displayed in Wizard mode the first time only.

You can also access the Configurator in the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="HSS.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, but only part of the parameters can be modified.

target.mrk: Lorsque l'installation est terminée, la fenêtre Configurateur s'affiche en mode Wizard pour la première fois seulement.

Vous pouvez également accéder au Configurateur dans la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="HSS.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, mais seule une partie des paramètres peut être modifiée.

trans-unit.source: It is necessary to use an internet browser to configure . To configure and activate the deduplication engine, you can enter the path https://hostname:8181 in a browser. hostname corresponds to the server on which the binaries are installed.

seg-source.mrk: It is necessary to use an internet browser to configure <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="General.ProductNameHSS" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.
To configure and activate the deduplication engine, you can enter the path https://hostname:8181 in a browser.
hostname corresponds to the server on which the binaries are installed.

target.mrk: Il est nécessaire d'utiliser un navigateur Internet pour configurer <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="General.ProductNameHSS" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.
Pour configurer et activer le moteur de déduplication, vous pouvez saisir le chemin https://hostname:8181 dans un navigateur.
hostname correspond au serveur sur lequel les binaires sont installés.

trans-unit.source: The Configurator enables you to move the data storage directories at any time. The aim is to easily distribute data on disks.

seg-source.mrk: The Configurator enables you to move the data storage directories at any time.
The aim is to easily distribute data on disks.

target.mrk: Le configurateur vous permet de déplacer les répertoires de stockage de données à tout moment.
L'objectif est de distribuer facilement des données sur des disques.

trans-unit.source: This information can display in each section:

seg-source.mrk: This information can display in each section:

target.mrk: Ces informations peuvent s'afficher dans chaque section :

trans-unit.source: <MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2022-06-30T11:48:33.1656786+02:00" MadCap:creator="lisal" MadCap:initials="LI" MadCap:comment="pas trouvé, à retirer N=?" MadCap:editor="lisal" MadCap:editDate="2022-06-30T11:48:50.2046956+02:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Usage: </MadCap:annotation>Corresponds to how data will be read or written (e.g., sequential or random). The modification of the default setting is recommended.

seg-source.mrk: <MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2022-06-30T11:48:33.1656786+02:00" MadCap:creator="lisal" MadCap:initials="LI" MadCap:comment="pas trouvé, à retirer N=?" MadCap:editor="lisal" MadCap:editDate="2022-06-30T11:48:50.2046956+02:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Usage: </MadCap:annotation>Corresponds to how data will be read or written (e.g., sequential or random).
The modification of the default setting is recommended.

target.mrk: <MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2022-06-30T11:48:33.1656786+02:00" MadCap:creator="lisal" MadCap:initials="LI" MadCap:comment="pas trouvé, à retirer N=?" MadCap:editor="lisal" MadCap:editDate="2022-06-30T11:48:50.2046956+02:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Utilisation : </MadCap:annotation>Correspond à la façon dont les données seront lues ou écrites (par exemple, séquentielles ou aléatoires).
La modification du paramètre par défaut est recommandée.

trans-unit.source: <MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2022-06-30T11:49:07.4461974+02:00" MadCap:creator="lisal" MadCap:initials="LI" MadCap:comment="pas trouvé, à retirer N=?" MadCap:editor="lisal" MadCap:editDate="2022-06-30T11:49:11.9355513+02:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Advanced mode of bloc</MadCap:annotation>k movements: Enables you to distribute the blocks in the directories (repository).

target.mrk: <MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2022-06-30T11:49:07.4461974+02:00" MadCap:creator="lisal" MadCap:initials="LI" MadCap:comment="pas trouvé, à retirer N=?" MadCap:editor="lisal" MadCap:editDate="2022-06-30T11:49:11.9355513+02:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Mode avancé des mouvements de bloc</MadCap:annotation> : permet de distribuer les blocs dans les répertoires (espaces de stockage).
